Independence Avenue, at the southeast corner of Kappock Street, showing in a set of 2 views, the real estate offices of the I. G.
Johnson Estate.

701295f-a.folder: Independence Avenue & Kappock Street, Bronx, NY

701296f-b.text:
Independence Avenue, adjoining the southwest corner of Kappock Street, showing the old Berrien House. It predates the American Revolution and was a popular resort for Loyalists. The grounds afford a magnificent view of the
Hudson River.
P. L. Sperr  May 25, 1937
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1, 2, 3
701296f-b.folder: Independence Avenue & Kappock Street, Bronx, NY
